name: Fire stuff
full_description: Thanks to the fire staff, wizards can inspire fear and burn everything in their path.

name: Ice stuff
full_description: Thanks to the ice staff, magicians can freeze everything around and cool down the ardor of enemies

name: Mystic ball
description: This ball use Wizards arcane sciences.
full_description: Thanks to this orb, they can use suggestion to charm everyone without resorting to violence
